name: Legend of Pandora
description:
Legend of Pandora was a mini game originally made for the Open Pandora handheld gaming system. I ported it over to Windows for others to enjoy.

If you have a Pandora you may get the game here: Open Pandora Repo

Ed, our hero, must defeat three bosses to collect all parts of the Pandora. Fight bats, trolls, rats, and ghosts to find success!

Gameplay time: Around 5 minutes on average. 

Package: Game is in a simple zip file, just download, decompress, and play!

Special keys: Use f for full-screen, q to quit, and left control to reset.
